function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement strict hygiene measures, limit research team exposure, and use remote data collection methods where possible","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish clear review criteria, provide training on data charting process, and have a standardized protocol for resolving disagreements","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop device-agnostic anomaly detection models by incorporating data from multiple devices and standardizing data formats.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Utilize automated feature extraction and selection techniques to ensure comprehensive and unbiased feature sets for model development.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct rigorous external validation using diverse and independent datasets to assess the generalizability and reliability of the anomaly detection models.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement supervised machine learning with labeled infectious and healthy periods to ensure accurate classification of covid-19 infection periods.","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Standardize accuracy measures, establish clear criteria for sensitivity and specificity values, and ensure transparency in reporting accuracy results.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of device-agnostic wearable technology with improved diagnostic capabilities","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of standardized data preparation protocols, increased feature selection, and use of data augmentation and external validation methods","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of diverse geographic regions and larger sample sizes in future studies","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Education on correct sensor placement, development of sensor designs that maintain good skin contact, and regular calibration of sensors","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing skin-friendly adhesives, promoting breaks from continuous wear, and designing comfortable wearable form factors","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development and use of alternative diagnostic techniques that do not pose radiation exposure risks.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improved representation of diverse geographic regions and population samples in training data to prevent spectrum bias.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement data augmentation techniques to counteract the spectrum bias.","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use external validation methods and increase sample sizes for more accurate performance distancing","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of cross-validation techniques and diverse training data","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establishment of uniform validation standards and reporting guidelines","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement a quality appraisal process for included
